items.name: Bottled Faith
explicitMods: Consecrated Ground created by this Flask has Tripled Radius
Consecrated Ground created during Effect applies 10% increased Damage taken to Enemies
132% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies on Consecrated Ground during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A tourniquet for the soul, squeezing ethereal into physical.

items.name: Kaom's Spirit
explicitMods: 0.34% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Life Recovery from Regeneration is not applied
Regenerate 1 Rage per second for every 100 Life Recovery per second from Regeneration
flavourText: Who can tell when whispers are truly from a god?

socketedItems.secDescrText: Engulfs you in magical fire that rapidly burns you and nearby enemies. Your spell damage is substantially increased while under this effect. The effect ends when you have 1 life remaining.
explicitMods: Deals 2447.9 Base Fire Damage per second
Deals 35% of your Maximum Life as Base Fire Damage per second
Deals 35% of your Maximum Energy Shield as Base Fire Damage per second
You Burn for 90% of your Maximum Life per second as Fire Damage
You Burn for 70% of your Maximum Energy Shield per second as Fire Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods:
Sacrifices 60% of your total Energy Shield and Life
Deals 158% of Sacrificed Energy Shield and Life as Fire Damage per second
Modifiers to Skill Effect Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention
hybrid.secDescrText: Sacrifices a portion of your Life and Energy Shield to engulf you in magical fire that rapidly burns nearby enemies for a duration. Your spell damage is increased while under this effect.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the quality of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: +24% to Quality of Supported Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Consumes Rage at an accelerating rate to provide a powerful buff, granting more attack damage, attack speed, movement speed, and less damage taken.
explicitMods: At least 5 Rage required to start Berserking
Each second, 20% more Rage loss Rate
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect

explicitMods: 10% increased Movement Speed if you haven't been Hit Recently

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.

You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly

socketedItems.secDescrText: Take less Physical and Elemental Damage for a short time. Consumes up to 5 Endurance Charges to lengthen the buff and further lessen Physical Damage taken. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.

items.name: Essence Worm

Socketed Gems have no Reservation
Your Blessing Skills are Disabled

Like any part of nightmare, it has found a way to make its price... acceptable."
